comment: Builder class for constructing {@link BatterySaverPolicyConfig} objects.

methods.name: public Builder setAdjustBrightnessFactor(float adjustBrightnessFactor)
methods.comment:
* Set how much to adjust the screen brightness while in Battery Saver. The value should
         * be in the [0, 1] range, where 1 will not change the brightness. This will have no
         * effect if {@link #setEnableAdjustBrightness(boolean)} is not called with {@code true}.

methods.name: public Builder setAdvertiseIsEnabled(boolean advertiseIsEnabled)
methods.comment:
* Set whether or not to tell the system (and other apps) that Battery Saver is
         * currently enabled.

methods.name: public Builder setDeferFullBackup(boolean deferFullBackup)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to defer full backup while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setDeferKeyValueBackup(boolean deferKeyValueBackup)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to defer key-value backup while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder addDeviceSpecificSetting(@NonNull String key, @NonNull String value)
methods.comment:
* Adds a key-value pair for device-specific battery saver constants. The supported keys
         * and values are the same as those in
         * {@link android.provider.Settings.Global#BATTERY_SAVER_DEVICE_SPECIFIC_CONSTANTS}.
         *
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the provided key is invalid (empty, null, or all
         * whitespace)

methods.name: public Builder setDisableAnimation(boolean disableAnimation)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to disable animation while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setDisableAod(boolean disableAod)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to disable Always On Display while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setDisableLaunchBoost(boolean disableLaunchBoost)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to disable launch boost while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setDisableOptionalSensors(boolean disableOptionalSensors)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to disable optional sensors while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setDisableSoundTrigger(boolean disableSoundTrigger)
public Builder setSoundTriggerMode(@PowerManager.SoundTriggerPowerSaveMode int soundTriggerMode)
methods.comment: * Set the SoundTrigger mode while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setDisableVibration(boolean disableVibration)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to disable vibration while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setEnableAdjustBrightness(boolean enableAdjustBrightness)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to enable brightness adjustment while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setEnableDataSaver(boolean enableDataSaver)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to enable Data Saver while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setEnableFirewall(boolean enableFirewall)
methods.comment:
* Set whether or not to enable network firewall rules to restrict background network use
         * while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setEnableNightMode(boolean enableNightMode)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to enable night mode while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setEnableQuickDoze(boolean enableQuickDoze)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to enable Quick Doze while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setForceAllAppsStandby(boolean forceAllAppsStandby)
methods.comment: Set whether or not to force all apps to standby mode while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setForceBackgroundCheck(boolean forceBackgroundCheck)
methods.comment:
* Set whether or not to force background check (disallow background services and manifest
         * broadcast receivers) on all apps (not just apps targeting Android
         * {@link Build.VERSION_CODES#O} and above)
         * while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public Builder setLocationMode(@PowerManager.LocationPowerSaveMode int locationMode)
methods.comment: Set the location mode while in Battery Saver.

methods.name: public BatterySaverPolicyConfig build()
methods.comment:
* Build a {@link BatterySaverPolicyConfig} object using the set parameters. This object
         * is immutable.

methodNames: public Builder addDeviceSpecificSetting(@NonNull String key, @NonNull String value)
